messages.content: What does the PoolManager hook do on Base Sepolia?
Category: BaseSepolia. Address: 0x05E73354cFDd6745C338b50BcFDfA3Aa6fA03408. Description: Core contract that manages Uniswap v4 pool state and operations. Notes: Uniswap Base Sepolia deployment.
What does the UniversalRouter hook do on Base Sepolia?

Category: BaseSepolia. Address: 0x492e6456d9528771018deb9e87ef7750ef184104. Description: Router contract that aggregates swap paths and performs multi-hop trades. Notes: Uniswap Base Sepolia deployment.
What does the PositionManager hook do on Base Sepolia?
Category: BaseSepolia. Address: 0x4b2c77d209d3405f41a037ec6c77f7f5b8e2ca80. Description: Manages user positions and LP NFT minting on Uniswap v4. Notes: Uniswap Base Sepolia deployment.
What does the StateView hook do on Base Sepolia?
Category: BaseSepolia. Address: 0x571291b572ed32ce6751a2cb2486ebee8defb9b4. Description: Read-only view contract exposing pool state and price information. Notes: nan.
What does the Quoter hook do on Base Sepolia?
Category: BaseSepolia. Address: 0x4a6513c898fe1b2d0e78d3b0e0a4151589b1cba. Description: Simulates swaps to provide quotes without executing them. Notes: nan.
What does the PoolSwapTest hook do on Base Sepolia?
Category: BaseSepolia. Address: 0x8b5bcc363dde2614281ad875bad385e0a785d3b9. Description: Test hook contract used to validate swap behaviour. Notes: nan.
What does the PoolModifyLiquidityTest hook do on Base Sepolia?
Category: BaseSepolia. Address: 0x37429cd17cb1454c34e7f50b09725202fd533039. Description: Test hook for modifying liquidity in pools. Notes: nan.
What does the Permit2 hook do on Base Sepolia?
Category: BaseSepolia. Address: 0x000000000022D473030F116dDEE9F6B43aC78BA3. Description: Shared token permit contract used across Uniswap components. Notes: nan.
What does the Flaunch hook do on Base?
Category: HookRankBase. Address: 0x51bba15255406cfe7099a42183302640ba7dafdc. Description: High-activity hook with thousands of pools and swaps on Base. Notes: Part of HookRank Top hooks.
What does the VerifiedPoolsBasicHook hook do on Base?
Category: HookRankBase. Address: 0x5cd525c621afca515bf58631d37d3bfa7b72aae4. Description: Hook ensuring pools meet verification criteria before trading. Notes: nan.
What does the Politiswap hook do on Base?
Category: HookRankBase. Address: 0x4cd3be87688aea2a0297c22c17a73cae65adc0cc. Description: Swap-oriented hook with moderate volume and TVL. Notes: nan.
What does the PositionManager (HookRank) hook do on Base?
Category: HookRankBase. Address: 0x7f85bb58059fbaf6bf19bdd2b9078d9e546efdc. Description: Hook used to manage positions across pools on the Base network. Notes: nan.
What does the BtcAccHook hook do on Base?
Category: HookRankBase. Address: 0x70426ac7043aeef50f47b6a03ae68ccf808e044. Description: Small hook that accumulates BTC with few pools and swaps. Notes: nan.
What does the SpawnerHook hook do on Base?
Category: HookRankBase. Address: 0xb476c448da4453208df4e371fee26f4e630d3044. Description: Spawns new pools/positions with high pool count and protocol fee collection. Notes: nan.
What does the ContentmentHook hook do on Base?
Category: HookRankBase. Address: 0x2a0e6206325c966fee8b2284ca1a276877332844. Description: Low-volume hook on Base focusing on stable liquidity. Notes: nan.
What does the LimitOrderHook (HookRank) hook do on Base?
Category: HookRankBase. Address: 0x9d119f505ca92f4b6983c1285d1ac0aaf7ec0c0. Description: Hook enabling limit orders in Uniswap v4 pools with tens of thousands of swaps. Notes: nan.
What does the SwapHook hook do on nan?
Category: UniswapExample. Address: nan. Description: Template hook that counts the number of calls to `beforeSwap` and `afterSwap` for each pool. Notes: Example from Uniswap quick-start docs.
What does the LiquidityHook hook do on nan?

Category: UniswapExample. Address: nan. Description: Example hook that tracks counts of liquidity additions and removals using `beforeAddLiquidity` and `beforeRemoveLiquidity`. Notes: Tutorial example from Uniswap docs.
What does the AsyncSwapHook hook do on nan?

Category: UniswapExample. Address: nan. Description: Advanced example illustrating asynchronous swaps by returning a delta in `beforeSwap` and skipping Uniswapâ€™s internal swap logic. Notes: Requires enabling the `beforeSwapReturnDelta` permission.
